title: Video: Unicorn Kid – Pure Space
body:
This little baby has been sitting on a tab in my browser all day waiting to get blogged.

I don’t want to deny him that.

The new video from **[Unicorn Kid](https://www.facebook.com/unicornkidmusic)**, on the surface is achingly cool. The phrase ‘too cool for school’ might as well have been written for this video. But do you know what? I don’t care. If kids want to drop E, play Gameboy classics in Berlin subways and spend every given moment looking like they’re posing for a **Dazed and Confused** shoot, then who am I to stop them?

Exactly, I’m nobody.

Going to go cry now.
